predicate.note: Frames file for 'rework' based on sentences in financial subcorpus. No Verbnet entry.

example.name: purpose should be arg?
example.text: We know Verdi's own contribution was mighty impressive since the operatic ``Libera me'' was reworked *trace* for the Manzoni Requiem, of which he wrote every note himself having learned his lesson.
example.arg: the Manzoni Requiem, of which he wrote every note himself having learned his lesson
